title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at upper right: DIN-A-1; lower left in graphite: K. 9/30/33; lower right: SCALE 1"-1'0"/7481 [circled]; lower right in red color pencil: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of sideboard. Rectangular body with rounded front edges, straight, strip legs with rounded feet and stretcher between front and back feet. Two cabinets in front of sideboard with opening near center; rectangular pulls. Legs probably metal, top and sides wood, cabinets in different wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-908.
